dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description: Perl4::CoreLibs - libraries historically supplied with Perl 4
dependencies.name: perl-perl4-corelibs

dependent_to.description: Redundans pipeline assists an assembly of heterozygous genomes.
dependent_to.name: redundans

description:
SSPACE standard is a stand-alone program for scaffolding pre-assembled
contigs using NGS paired-read data Note: A manual download is required
for SSPACE-Standard. Spack will search your current directory for the
download file. Alternatively, add this file to a mirror so that Spack
can find it. For instructions on how to set up a mirror, see
https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mirrors.html
name: sspace-standard

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
